client

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Main controller in our MEAT system
    How to run this program.
    1. Interactive mode : java -jar MEAT.jar
    2. ScriptCommdnRun mode : java -jar MEAT.jar filename.json
    3. Load externalDB mode : java -jar MEAT.jar DBSYNC
    Author:
    group7
